history.author: user
history.text: Hi! I am working at home today. Do you need something?

history.author: contact
history.text: Oh, nothing urgent. Thought you're somewhere here at the office. See you tomorow

history.author: contact
history.text: Quikly come to the meeting room 1B, we have a big server issue

history.author: user
history.text: I'm having breakfast right now, cant'n you wait for 10 minutes?

history.author: contact
history.text: Quikly come to the meeting room 1B, we have a big server issue

history.author: contact
history.text: Hi! Heard you had some server issues yesterday. Is everything ok?

history.author: user
history.text: Hi! Nothing serious. We've managed it.

history.author: contact
history.text: Are you sure? Josefina called me and was very angry at you. What happened?

history.author: user
history.text: I was having my breakfast and didn't showed up the same second she called me.
